Package Server

Top level Vicar package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Global
    Installation specific settings.
    LogWriter
    Provides a static method for recording various events.
    SessionSaver
    Saves a user's settings to the file specified by Global.SESSION_FILE which is stored in the user's path.

Package Server Description

Top level Vicar package. Should this be renamed to edu.unl.vicar. Requires servlet-api.jar for servlet 3.0 functionality. If you are using tomcat7 then this should already be available in it's corelibdir. If you are using the jetty web server that came with cocoon.2.11 then you may need to replace servlet_2_2.jar with servlet-api.jar.
Version:
0.8, 12/15/2012
Author:
Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu
